4:

Text: Zaireeka:  The album's title is a portmanteau of two words: "Zaire", chosen as a symbol of anarchy after Wayne Coyne heard a radio news story about the political instability of the African nation, and "eureka" (literally: "I have found it"), an expression of joyous discovery.
